FilterItemPortable.Name: Padr√£o
FilterItemPortable.VirtualTableWhereClause: (A.AP = @CAMPO(NUMEROAP) OR @CAMPO(NUMEROAP) = -1) AND (A.PESSOA IN (@CAMPO(PESSOA)) OR @CAMPO(PESSOA) = -1) AND ( ( (A.DATAVENCIMENTO BETWEEN @CAMPO(DATAINICIAL) AND @CAMPO(DATAFINAL)) OR (@CAMPO(DATAINICIAL) IS NULL OR @CAMPO(DATAFINAL) IS NULL) ) OR ( (A.VCTOPRORROGADO BETWEEN @CAMPO(DATAINICIAL) AND @CAMPO(DATAFINAL)) OR (@CAMPO(DATAINICIAL) IS NULL OR @CAMPO(DATAFINAL) IS NULL) ) ) AND ( ((A.CODIGOBARRAS IS NULL OR A.CODIGOBARRAS = '') AND @CAMPO(CODIGOBARRAS) = 1) OR (A.CODIGOBARRAS IS NOT NULL AND @CAMPO(CODIGOBARRAS) = 2) OR (@CAMPO(CODIGOBARRAS) = '') ) AND ( ((A.HANDLEFORMALIQUIDACAO IS NULL OR A.HANDLEFORMALIQUIDACAO = 0) AND @CAMPO(FORMALIQUIDACAO) = 1) OR (A.HANDLEFORMALIQUIDACAO IS NOT NULL AND @CAMPO(FORMALIQUIDACAO) = 2) )
